status.description: the current status of the transaction

latestLedger.description: The latest ledger known to Soroban-RPC at the time it handled the request

latestLedgerCloseTime.description: The unix timestamp of the close time of the latest ledger known to Soroban-RPC at the time it handled the request

oldestLedger.description: The oldest ledger ingested by Soroban-RPC at the time it handled the request

oldestLedgerCloseTime.description: The unix timestamp of the close time of the oldest ledger ingested by Soroban-RPC at the time it handled the request

ledger.description: The sequence of the ledger which included the transaction. This field is only present if status is SUCCESS or FAILED

createdAt.description: The unix timestamp of when the transaction was included in the ledger. This field is only present if status is SUCCESS or FAILED

applicationOrder.description: The index of the transaction among all transactions included in the ledger. This field is only present if status is SUCCESS or FAILED

feeBump.description: Indicates whether the transaction was fee bumped. This field is only present if status is SUCCESS or FAILED

envelopeXdr.description: A base64 encoded string of the raw TransactionEnvelope XDR struct for this transaction

resultXdr.description: A base64 encoded string of the raw TransactionResult XDR struct for this transaction. This field is only present if status is SUCCESS or FAILED

resultMetaXdr.description: A base64 encoded string of the raw TransactionResultMeta XDR struct for this transaction
